title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Roper's Garden
content: Small green area, with benches, by the Thames.  Created in the crater of a World War II bomb site, it contains an ancient cherry tree to commemorate the visit of Gunji Koizumi, the man who introduced judo to the country.  Named after Margaret Roper n√©e More, to whom the area was a gift from her father, Sir Thomas More, on her marriage to William Roper.
